name: Heat Sword
description: A strong blade capable of inflicting <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Slash Damage to its foes.

languages.description: Eine starke Klinge, die in der Lage dazu ist, <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Schnittschaden an den Gegnern zu verursachen.
languages.name: Hitzeschwert

languages.description: Une lame solide capable d'infliger des Dégâts <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Tranchants à ses ennemis.
languages.name: Épée de Chaleur

languages.description: Una lama potente in grado di infliggere Danno <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Taglio ai suoi nemici.
languages.name: Heat Sword

languages.description: 적들에게 <DT_SLASH_COLOR>베기 피해를 가할 수 있는 강력한 검입니다.
languages.name: 히트 소드

languages.description: Una poderosa espada capaz de infligir daño <DT_SLASH_COLOR>cortante a sus enemigos.
languages.name: Espada de calor

languages.description: （英文：HEAT SWORD）其强力的刀刃能对敌人造成 <DT_SLASH_COLOR>切割伤害。
languages.name: 烈焰长剑

languages.description: どんな敵にも <DT_SLASH_COLOR>切断ダメージを与える強力な刃。
languages.name: Heat Sword

languages.description: Mocne ostrze zdolne do zadawania wrogom obrażeń <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Tnących.
languages.name: Miecz Żaru

languages.description: Uma lâmina forte capaz de aplicar Dano <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Cortante nos inimigos.
languages.name: Espada Ígnea

languages.description: （英文：HEAT SWORD）其強力的刀刃能對敵人造成 <DT_SLASH_COLOR> 切割傷害。
languages.name: 烈焰長劍

languages.description: ดาบอันทรงพลังที่สามารถสร้างความเสียหายจาก <DT_SLASH_COLOR>การฟันให้กับศัตรูได้
languages.name: Heat Sword

languages.description: Rakiplerine <DT_SLASH_COLOR>Kesme hasarı verebilen güçlü bir kılıç.
languages.name: Heat Sword

languages.description: Меч із загартованим клинком, завдає <DT_SLASH_COLOR>різальної шкоди.
languages.name: Вогнемеч
